name: Failed Negotiations
overview: A public domain crosshairs shooter created by the Venables brothers and released in 1998, in it you are a member of a highly trained SWAT team. It is your job to take out well organized gangs of criminals who have taken hostage, innocent members of the general public for their own evil ends. All attempts at negotiation with the armed gangs have failed. You must dispose of the villains and kill the gang bosses. Only then can you retire and enjoy your pension.
